name: CHIRPRadio
0:
”Alexa, open CHIRP Radio.”
”Tell CHIRP Radio to listen live.”
”Ask CHIRP Radio to play the podcast.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chirp radio
des:
CHIRP Radio plays a wide mix of independent, local, and just generally good music curated by knowledgeable DJs who are always live from our Chicago studios. You can tune in to our live stream or listen to our podcast!

Once you've enabled the skill, say, "Alexa, open CHIRP Radio," then follow the prompts from there.

You can also say, "Alexa, tell CHIRP Radio..."
"To listen live."
"To play the podcast"

For instructions on interacting with this skill, say "help."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
